item1.name: Saffron Risotto Milanese
item1.description: Creamy Arborio rice infused with saffron, Parmesan, and a hint of white wine, topped with gold leaf.
item2.name: Seared Scallops with Truffle
item2.description: Pan-seared U10 scallops served with a black truffle-infused cauliflower purée and asparagus spears.
item3.name: Wagyu Beef Medallions
item3.description: A5 Wagyu beef, grilled to perfection, accompanied by a rich red wine reduction and potato gratin.
item4.name: Lobster Thermidor
item4.description: Classic French dish of lobster meat cooked in a rich wine sauce, stuffed back into the lobster shell, and browned.
item5.name: Deconstructed Tiramisu
item5.description: An artistic take on the classic Italian dessert, with espresso-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cream, and cocoa dust.
item6.name: Golden Opulence Sundae
item6.description: Tahitian vanilla bean ice cream, Madagascar vanilla, 23k edible gold leaf, and rare Amedei Porcelana chocolate.
item7.name: Burrata Caprese
item7.description: Fresh Burrata cheese served with heirloom tomatoes, basil pesto, and a balsamic glaze.
item8.name: Classic Crème Brûlée
item8.description: Rich custard base topped with a layer of hardened caramelized sugar.
